comment: Easiest A ever. Just turn in the work, which isn't heavy at all, and you'll for sure get an A. Took this as a summer 4 week session class and it was a nice little GPA booster for me. Not demanding at all, and doesn't require much from you. I had a part time job and I took 9 other credits in the summer and this was not stressful in the least.

Took this class during the summer as a 4 week session. The very definition of an EASY A. Work for each module doesn't take more than 2 hours each to complete. I didn't need this class for credit per se, but just needed extra credits in general for a certification I needed and I wanted the most bare minimum, hands off class and this was it!
The class was very easy. Just make sure to complete the assignments on time as the grading is not tough.

Dr.Culp is one of the best professors I have taken at KSU. I took him for HPAL 3300, you are graded on mastering HW, tests (no lockdown,super easy if you do the HW), 2 projects, and 3 discussion posts with replies.He answers his emails quickly/attempts to fix whatever problem you are having. He also puts funny GenZ references in his announcements.

Dr.Culp was one of the easiest classes I took. I actually had him for my Intro to HPAL class. Easy grader only 3 papers which I got 100% on all pretty much for just turning them in. test and quizzes were easy just use your notes.

Took him during the summer. The class was straightforward. Graded all assignments within1 day. Just complete the assignments and you will have no issues. All assignments were open and I worked at my own pace.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Culp made this class so easy. He responds to emails quickly and gives amazing feedback. You cant fail this class. I came on RMP before selecting his class and I am very satisfied with my grade and I learned a ton! He is defiantly one of my favorite professors at KSU!
Do not take this class. That is all I have to say.

Super cool professor. Easy to talk to, just make sure you study what you are given for the test. Test aren't too difficult if you show up for class. Should get an A in his class if you do everything you need to.
Great professor! His lectures and videos are very informative. Highly enjoyed his class and look forward to more with him.
Dr. Culp is a very funny man. His class is not hard and is for sure an easy A. I would recommend Culp to anybody.
Best teacher I ever had! Cool teacher! Fun will joke with you! Take his Wellness class! I took it during the summer!
Dr. Culp is great. This class was boring but an easy A. He is very reasonable. He takes this class seriously, but he knows that this is a university requirement so he does not make the class insane.

DR. Culp is amazing. His funny stories kept me engaged during this 9:30 class, the class has 4 tests which he gives you study guides for. One project and one paper. The rest of the class are attendance grades and "quizzes". I would recommend him if you want a laugh and a understanding professor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Hilarious

comment: Dr. Culp is an amazing professor. He clearly states what it takes to make an A in the class. All the work was online & the due dates were very specific. If you do the work and turn things in on time, its an easy A. I took him summer 4 week session & was also working full time & got a 100 in the class. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO TAKE THIS IN THE SUMMER!
